page.title: 06CULLODEN HOUSE (HOTEL)
page.content: Culloden House is a prestige hotel standing in 40 acres of land.The house has had many famous people staying there including football teams,members of the royal family and show buisness personalities.There are about 20 bed rooms in the house.They employ about 35 to 40 people a year.It is mostly full from June to October.The house was bought in 1981 by the present owner.In the grounds there is a pond and one tennis court,there is a big green in front of the house,sometimes they put out tables and chairs.There is also an orchard at the back of the house. There are stables across from it.
